Crash course - GUIÂ¶

Simply launch the GUI via double click on launch_allesfitter (launch_allesfitter; for Mac/Windows/Linux). Now fill out the fields step by step, hit the run button, and lean back. All of this is demonstrated in this video tutorial:

Alternatively, you can also launch the GUI fro a Python console:

import allesfitter
allesfitter.GUI()
